Seek medical help
You should contact your GP 
if you have a sudden ‘acute’ 
illness like diarrhoea, vomiting, 
abdominal pain, high fever or 
severe itch.
Vaginal bleeding 
Bleeding from the vagina at 
any time in pregnancy can 
be a dangerous sign. Some 
causes of vaginal bleeding are 
more serious than others, so 
it’s	important	to	find	the	cause	
straight away.
Bleeding after sex
